hotel_desc: A magnificent 5-star resort located on pristine white sand beach with world-class amenities, luxurious accommodations, and exceptional service. Featuring multiple infinity pools, spa facilities, fine dining restaurants, and direct beach access.
hotel_placedetails: 123 Tran Hung Dao Street, Nha Trang, Vietnam
hotel_tag_keyword: beach, luxury, resort, spa, infinity pool, fine dining
